Status is automatically updated via vehicle UX restrictions.

This is a very long informational text about vehicle distraction optimization. The Android Automotive OS platform provides comprehensive UX restrictions to ensure safety while driving. Various functions such as telephony, keyboard input, video playback, and messaging features can be dynamically restricted based on the vehicle state. These restrictions are automatically applied by the system and cannot be manually overridden to guarantee maximum safety.
